name: Sacrifice (itch) (DistrictZ)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

A and D to move / SPACE to jump / L(less) to shrink and M(more) to grow 

DESCRIPTION:

In this adventure puzzle platformer you play as Olaf the little square.

Help him navigate through the levels by changing his size which also increases or lowers his jump strength or vision.

Beat all 10 levels in the shortest  amount of time possible.

DISCLAIMER:

This game was made in 48 hours.
